code: import _objectSpread from"/home/moe/Development/whack-a-bebsi/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import{GET_SCORE,SET_SETTINGS,PLAY_AUDIO,TIMER}from"../actions";var initialState={size:3,score:0,speed:0.3,time:60};var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_SETTINGS:return _objectSpread({},state,{speed:action.payload.speed,size:action.payload.size});case GET_SCORE:return _objectSpread({},state,{score:action.payload+state.score});case PLAY_AUDIO:return _objectSpread({},state,{score:action.payload});case TIMER:return _objectSpread({},state,{time:action.payload});default:return state;}};export default reducer;
